oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Military commision, signed by Gov. Andrew Johnson, for William H. Sloan as 1st Lt., Co. A, 3rd Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Signed by Gov. Johnson on August 29, 1864, this commission promotes William H. Sloan of Monroe County, Tenn. to 1st Lt. in Co. A, 3rd Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA. This East Tennessee Union regiment saw extensive action in Middle Tennessee, Mississippi and Alabama, suffering major setbacks at at the hands of Gen. N. B. Forrest at Athens and Sulphur Trestle, Ala. in 1864. Nearly 200 members of the regiment perished in the Sultana disaster in April 1865.
